scripts.build: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix client && npm run build:client --prefix client && bash -lc 'if [ -f public/index.html ]; then echo "Vite already wrote to /public"; elif [ -d client/dist ]; then echo "Copying client/dist -> public"; rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp -a client/dist/. public/; elif [ -d client/build ]; then echo "Copying client/build -> public"; rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp -a client/build/. public/; else echo "No client build output found (expected public/, client/dist, or client/build)"; exit 1; fi; echo "--- /public"; ls -lah public | head; echo "--- /public/assets"; ls -lah public/assets | head'
